Text:
ops hit enter by mistake why its brief

converted tnes mp4 to 360p xvid mp3 cbr 128 1000bitrate

help seed

I see tne is trying to educate people how to convert to xvids.. 

i have no problem with that.. if someone wants to convert his to xvids and share it save me doing them and data too

but be warned.. mp4s dont always convert in sync regardless of what soft you use..

so you will need to learn a couple of tools to edit
the sync and always double check in random places before uploading.. I try to.. but sometimes I miss the odd one

it wasn't meant to have people share their conversion to AVI, it's so they can have an AVI without waiting on a middleman.

have you even tried MeGUI? in the past you have listed other freeware and i checked the mediainfo of one of your recent torrents and haven't seen anything that indicates MeGUI was used.

i've used that tutorial to test a bunch of mp4 samples and as long as the input is in sync then it will convert just fine without an A/V sync issue.

...just speaking from personal experience.

some people dont want to convert.. some freak out when it gets to nerdy for them.. they just want the show in the format they want

yes I did try  meGUI but other soft still does it better 

but I would rather download others converts then share my converts or hace to convert it myself too :) less hassle less work less data
